actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit purchases with Federal funds of articles or materials originating in countries which are not parties to or which are violators of a multilateral international agreement prescribing a code of government procurement.

summary.text: Prohibits the procurement with Federal funds of materials or articles from: (1) foreign countries which are not parties to international agreements prescribing a code for procurement by governments; or (2) countries in violation of such code.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit purchases with Federal funds of articles or materials originating in countries which are not parties to or which are violators of a multilateral international agreement prescribing a code of government procurement.
